sn_ex_sp_task_tab_configuration.multiline_script: /** * `answer` should be returned in JSON array in below format * The `current` object refers to the current Task(extension) record * returns JSON of following format * { selectable: true, columns: ['column_ref_name'], lineItemsData: [{ isExpanded: false, selectable: true, defaultSelected: true, sys_id, rowData: { column_ref_name: { label, value, color: (bg - success / bg - info / bg - warning) }, }, additionalData: [{ label, value } ] }], filterConfig: { column: 'column_ref_name', values: [{ label, value }] } } **/ (function (current) { // write your code here return {}; })(current);
sn_ex_sp_task_tab_configuration.name: Additional Details
